# This shows how to use the --verbose flag to see what muxt is doing during generation.

muxt generate --verbose --output-routes-func=Routes

stdout 'generating handler for'
stdout 'GET /'

exists template_routes.go

-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.24
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var source embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "template.gohtml"))
-- template.gohtml --
{{define "GET /"}}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>
  <h1>Debug Example</h1>
</body>
</html>
{{end}}
